commit.message: [HBASE-24441]CacheConfig details logged at Store open is not really useful

nodes.bodyText: Ya this is some thing we can avoid
All these test changes will be not needed

Here this blockCache will just give object identifier as no toString() there. BlockCache will be single object within RS. So IMO there is no need to log that with every Store create.  Anyway if you do other comment, we will avoid it as CacheConfig#toString() wont be having BlockCache object

commit.message:

nodes.bodyText: Looks good. There is another jira where we discuss abt  changing HStore#toString() to add region info also there. Then u will need to change this also.

commit.message: Use the new HStore#toString() provided by HBASE-24468 to print the HStore
